imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Convert and save the uploaded logo as a clean PNG with transparent background, preserving the stylized dark charcoal and deep red 'ab' letterform with layered diamond accent below (download.webp > app-logo.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Replace the current app logo image with the newly uploaded logo (download.webp) in both AppHeader.tsx and SplashScreen.tsx. Save the new logo as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/app-logo.png and update all references to use this file.
